thread.title: There's new hope that Halo 5: Guardians might be released for PC and Windows 10

title: There's new hope that Halo 5: Guardians might be released for PC and Windows 10
text:
There's new hope that Halo 5: Guardians might be released for PC and Windows 10 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
At the moment, the only way to play Halo 5: Guardians is on Xbox One console. However, the franchise director for the Halo series, Microsoft...
